channel.title: Npc
channel.description:
Hello i putted this tutorial in my client
http://www.google.nl/showthrea...ars+sub+bosses
but now the problem is im stuck
i need to make the monsters use the att death block anim
im realy stuck im trying to find it like for the hole day!!! i used z-filesearcher in my client and server but cant find anything!!
plz help me fix it
More info
Npc ID = 1974
Attack Emote = 7060 Block Emote = 7061 Die Emote = 7062 Range Attack Emote = 7063
Can mabye somebody make a code of it and tell me where to put those codes to let my bandos use those emotes
Ps. Link just remove google and replace with r u n e-s e r v e r.org :O
